rules.title: Acknowledge Call
rules.action: Acknowledge the call, thank the caller, and ask how to assist.
rules.example: Thank you for calling [Clinic Name], this is [Agent Name], how may I help you?

rules.title: Staff Member Request
rules.condition: If a caller asks for a specific staff member.
rules.action: Ask for the caller's name and purpose, then inform of a brief hold to check availability.
rules.example: Certainly, may I ask your name and the reason for your call so I can connect you appropriately? Please hold briefly while I check their availability.

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: After the patient states their new/established status.
rules.action: Acknowledge their status before requesting further identification or insurance information.
rules.example: Okay, thank you for letting me know.

rules.title: Locate Established Patient Chart
rules.action: Ask for a phone number or date of birth to locate their patient chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could you please provide your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Chart Retrieval Notification
rules.action: Inform the customer that the chart will be pulled up and they may be placed on brief hold.
rules.example: Thank you, I'll just pull up your chart now. This may take a moment, so I might place you on a brief hold.

rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: When a caller requests an appointment booking.
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Clarify Appointment Type
rules.condition: After the patient's chart has been retrieved.
rules.action: Clarify the specific type of appointment needed.
rules.example: Now that I have your chart open, what type of appointment are you looking to schedule today?

rules.title: Suggest Re-evaluation
rules.condition: If an established patient is returning after a long absence.
rules.action: Suggest a specific re-evaluation type of exam.
rules.example: Since it's been a while since your last visit, we often recommend a re-evaluation exam to ensure we address any new concerns. Does that sound appropriate?

rules.title: Ascertain Scheduling Preference
rules.condition: After the specific type of appointment has been identified.
rules.action: Ask about the customer's preferred day or time for scheduling.
rules.example: Great, we have [Appointment Type] available. What day or time works best for your appointment?

rules.title: New Patient Initial Inquiry
rules.action: Check availability, inquire about insurance, and ask for the insurance provider's name.
rules.example: Welcome! To help me schedule your first visit, can I ask if you'll be using insurance, and if so, which provider?
